# API Documentation

Complete API references for all Wizard packages.

## Browse Full API Documentation

**[ðŸ“– Complete TypeDoc Reference](/typedoc)** - Auto-generated from TypeScript source code with detailed function signatures, types, and examples.

## Package Overview

### [@wizard/core](core)
Core wizard library with type-safe state management, helpers, and advanced features.

### [@wizard/react](react)
React adapter with hooks, providers, and router integration.

## Quick Links

### Core API
- [Main Functions](core#main-functions) - `createWizard`, `createHelpers`
- [Core Types](core#core-types) - `WizardConfig`, `StepDefinition`, `WizardState`
- [Wizard Instance](core#wizard-instance-api) - Navigation, state, and status methods
- [WizardHelpers](core#wizardhelpers-api) - 30+ utility methods
- [Pure Selectors](core#pure-selectors) - Tree-shakable state selectors

### React API
- [Provider Component](react#provider-component) - `WizardProvider`
- [Core Hooks](react#core-hooks) - State, actions, and data hooks
- [Router Integration](react#router-integration-hooks) - Sync with routing
- [Advanced Patterns](react#advanced-patterns) - Custom hooks and optimization

## Package Versions

- `@wizard/core`: 1.0.0
- `@wizard/react`: 1.0.0

## TypeScript Support

All packages are written in TypeScript and provide full type definitions. The wizard system is deeply type-safe, catching errors at compile time for:

- Invalid step names
- Incorrect data shapes
- Context mutations
- Navigation paths
- Helper method usage

## Import Examples

```typescript
// Core library
import { createWizard, type WizardConfig } from '@wizard/core';
import { selectors } from '@wizard/core';

// React adapter
import {
  WizardProvider,
  useWizard,
  useWizardState,
  useWizardActions
} from '@wizard/react';

// Router integration
import {
  useSyncWizardWithRouter,
  useTanStackRouterSync
} from '@wizard/react';
```
